#####List of git commands that have come in handy while working, developpers can add to the list. Git syntax can be run from the Terminal within the PHS RStudio Server.

&nbsp;

Description | Git Syntax
----------- | -------------
Switch to another branch | `git checkout main`
Check branch status | `git status`
Stage all tracked changes | `git add .`
Commit staged changes | `git commit -a`
Delete a branch remotely | `git branch --delete --remotes origin/branch-name`
Delete a branch locally | `git branch --delete branch-name`
